title: You wake up in the room of your main... (male or female)
body: How did u get there? For me... praised a little too hard and passed out.

replies.body: Did she provide any "pillows?"

the highest of quality ones... very soft

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/446/460/866.gif

Well shit.... 

{{champion:412}} Main here... Tell my gf I love her ;~;
Nah, Thresh got waifu steal, he's coming for your girl
ROFL, good point XD My comment still stands.

{{champion:41}} Ate Orange,

Wasn't K.

Since my top male is {{champion:17}} and my top female is {{champion:18}}, the answer would be the same.

They allowed me to crash in their house and they slept on the couch for the night because they wanted to show their yordle hospitality.

PS: I banged my head at least twice or thrice due to small houses.

Tristana and Teemo are definitely both pretty chill.
Lol teemo's lore states that he's essentially totally wonked in the head...
Teemo can be the best friend in the world, but will go full-psycho mode as soon as an enemy approaches!
So, in other words... PTSD.
{{champion:18}} She thought I had a rocket in my pocket

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/586/212/52c.jpg
Draven was drunk and thought I was Draven, when Draven realized I'm not Draven, Draven kicked me out.
{{champion:40}} 
2.95$ a minute.
"For Demacia" LOL
{{champion:131}} Woke up confused, then I remembered I told Diana how bad her jokes was before she punches me in the face. She was gentle enough to let me rest in her room.
Was she gentle with other things?
No, she later forced me to praise the Moon and drew on my forehead the lunari symbol with a permanent marker :(
"Praise the moon"  ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Male: {{champion:202}} : Probably got kidnapped 

Female: {{champion:134}} : Had too much fun playing with balls

master yi


he cut me into 1,000 pieces, but i couldnt fight back, he was too tanky and strong and fast
Your name makes me laugh uncontrollably
Maybe u fell asleep while babysitting her. I never set the CIRCUMSTANCES of this question
It's never a good idea to fall asleep in a room with possibly a sadistic child who is also bit of a pyromaniac.
{{champion:421}} I am being held as food for the hatchlings

{{champion:80}} 

I was privileged to dine at his feet!!!

Wait, why is it so dark in here.
What's that red light over there.
"[...](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/f4/Sion.attackInnate03.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20140929215944)"
Nope

Your main is what?

Morde, Elise, Aatrox?
click dots.

Fine make me do work

(Checks OP.GG)

You play aatrox and pantheon

But your mains according to this are vi and cho...

Hm

Back when i played ranked a lot, towards the beginning of the season, I played lots of vi and lots of cho.
Kind of surprised to see vi at the top still though, I'm not as good as I could be with her.

also by dots I mean these dots.
"[...](http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/f4/Sion.attackInnate03.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20140929215944)"
The ones in the quotation marks. click them.

Meh, I don't know 

But which blood eye is it

Metal or Vampire sword
https://i.gyazo.com/cf9d596f51ce214e0ec78dcdfe64ba64.gif
I think she ulted me into the room, so she can blow me away again{{champion:40}}
Dont forget to pay the 2 95
Drained too much blood praising his praise-worthy pale butt. He ensured that it made it back inside me.

{{champion:163}} was being bullied by {{champion:4}} and {{champion:112}}. They made her think she is weak and laughed at her. I stepped in, making {{champion:163}} realise how strong she really is and together we stomped the bullies. I got hit by a gold card and couldn't protect myself as I don't have special abilities. {{champion:163}} took care of me as I then woke up in her room. 

_Better than Twilight_
"That was AMAZING! let us see if we can do it again..." ;D
i dont have a main. That means i wake up in a room with no one. basically my normal life.

{{champion:8}} Uhhhh. . . I think he may or may not have gotten a tad thirsty and sucked me dry. 
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Wha? Where am I?

*Looks around to see a barracks loaded with Demacian propaganda*

Oh no, did I enlist myself in the Demacian military?

*Looks at contract reading "The signer of this document will be a part of the Demacian military for the next 20 years"

Not again...

Male main: {{champion:236}} I asked to help hunt Thresh, I don't wanna know what happened after ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Female main: {{champion:51}} She broke out the fuzzy cuffs ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Who cuffed who? ;)

Holy yes senpai noticed me <3
But I prefer to be cuffed, just like my dad (get it, cause he went to prison ;-; xD)
Its sunpai to you... and... ok?
